name: Larry & Lawrie
description: Larry sells tickets to Starr Park visitors under the watchful eye of his twin, Lawrie. Larry loves rules, they make life easier! Lawrie doesn't love rules so much as enforcing them. They make a good team.

gadgets.name: Order: Fall Back
gadgets.description: Dash towards Lawrie while Lawrie dashes towards you, healing both for 33% of max health.

starpowers.name: Protocol: Protect
starpowers.description: While Lawrie is in range, transfer 30% incoming damage to himself instead.

starpowers.name: Protocol: Assist
starpowers.description: While Lawrie is in range, reload 30% of your ammo whenever he damages an enemy.

tips: The Order: Fall Back Gadget is a more tactical movement use for whether your in Knockout or Showdown. If you spawn your twin brother Lawrie towards the enemy they might play less aggressive considering you're the main target. Thus, you can swap places given the right opponent and fast attack them unexpectedly.
Lawrie is also very useful in other game modes, such as Bounty, Wipeout, and Gem Grab, as he puts pressure on the enemy team and helps your team gaining map control.

Their first Star Power is useful to defend against aggressive melee Brawlers like Fang or El Primo, making it a hard task to take him down. Against area damage brawlers like Edgar, keep some distance between you and Lawrie to ensure that Lawrie will not take double damage from their attacks.

attack.name: Ticket Dispenser
attack.description: Shoot a ticket bundle over obstacles that explodes twice after landing, damaging nearby enemies.

super.name: Call For Backup
super.description: Throw a signal to summon your twin Lawrie for help. He will seek out any trouble makers and serve justice with his taser gun.
